ComicInfo.Title: A Song for Marianne!; Lost: One Vampire!; Doppelganger!!
ComicInfo.Summary:
A Song for Marianne!: One of Dracula's victim's comes to him for final death.
Lost: One Vampire!: Frank and Harold set out to locate Dracula.
Doppelganger!!: Blade faces his double.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
